meanings.sent1: The polypary was a group of tiny creatures living together.
meanings.sent2: The coral reef was made up of a polypary of small organisms.
meanings.sent3: The polypary of sea creatures threw a party under the sea.
meanings.sent4: The polypary resembled a bustling city of miniature beings.
meanings.sent5: The polypary swayed gently with the ocean currents, a living tapestry of life.

meanings.definition: The hard outer covering of a colony of polyps.
meanings.sent1: The polypary protected the delicate polyps from harm.
meanings.sent2: The polypary of the coral was strong and resilient.
meanings.sent3: The polypary of the sea creatures was as tough as armor.
meanings.sent4: The polypary shielded the polyps like a fortress.
meanings.sent5: The polypary gleamed in the sunlight, a natural shield for the colony.
